Entries.Daine.Aliyah.4H/t 0800 1800/SawEvent Dai: fall3/-1000 -1000/{{Aliyah}} 10 26 2 farmer 12 34 0/speed farmer -1/skippable/addConversationTopic Daine.SuddenStorm 1/addTemporaryActor {{Spreach}} 32 32 10 21 2 true/changeName {{Spreach}} Spreach/animate {{Spreach}} false true 250 24 25/positionOffset {{Aliyah}} 0 8/animate {{Aliyah}} false true 250 17 18 19 18/pause 50/advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 -2 0 0 -4 4 100/globalFadeToClear/viewport 16 26/pause 250/emote {{Spreach}} 24/pause 100/proceedPosition farmer/emote farmer 8/pause 250/emote {{Aliyah}} 16/speak {{Aliyah}} "Welcome, friend. To what do I owe this visit?$21"/pause 250/stopAnimation {{Aliyah}} 0/emote farmer 28/question null " #Is that a grave? I can go, if I'm interrupting...#Just wandering. What are you doing?"/pause 250/emote {{Aliyah}} 272/animate {{Aliyah}} false false 250 0 54 55 55 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 58 55 54 0/speak {{Aliyah}} "This is the grave of my late husband. I was just tidying it, you are more than welcome to linger. He would have liked the company.$22"/pause 250/question null " #I'm sorry for your loss.#Do you need an ear?"/pause 250/emote {{Spreach}} 24/faceDirection {{Aliyah}} 3/speak {{Aliyah}} "That is very kind of you, thank you, but I processed my pain some years ago. I prefer to remember him warmly, these days.$21"/pause 250/emote farmer 40/quickQuestion #What was your husband's name?#What was your husband like?(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.A(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.B
Entries.Daine.Aliyah.4H.A: pause 250/animate {{Aliyah}} false false 250 24 24 24 24/speak {{Aliyah}} "His name was Atzar Toirneach; he took my surname after marriage. Though he went by many, many other things.$20"/pause 250/emote {{Aliyah}} 32/facedirection {{Aliyah}} 2/speak {{Aliyah}} "He was a Gotoran man. I met him at the Night Market, he used to travel with them when I had first moved here, telling stories with shadows on a silk screen.$21#$b#He was the one who taught me to make coffee in hot sand, he planted half these flower boxes, he -$4"/beginSimultaneousCommand/action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Lightning 10 25/jump farmer 8/emote farmer 228/speak {{Aliyah}} "......$26"/setRaining Default true/setRaining Lemurkat_EastScarp true/setRaining Daine.TPOChoice true/endSimultaneouscommand/pause 250/playSound thunder/screenFlash 1/pause 250/speak {{Aliyah}} "Oh my stars....$27"/quickQuestion #DOC! Are you all right?!#Ah ahaha aha, ha, it's, it's your favorite song, huh....?(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.End1(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.End2
Entries.Daine.Aliyah.4H.B: pause 250/emote {{Aliyah}} 272/speak {{Aliyah}} "He made me laugh.$4"/emote {{Aliyah}} 272/animate {{Aliyah}} false false 250 12 20 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 70 70 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 71 20 12/speak {{Aliyah}} "I cannot tell you how awful all those puns were, farmer. He called me a 'fineapple', once, of all things...$18#$b#He had such a broad grin, and a broad, open demeanor...$4#$b#He brought so much warmth into the lives of everyone who knew him. And, he was Gotoran, you know.$20#$b#You can thank him for the coffee, as he was the one who taught me to brew it after all. Honestly, so many of my loves trace back to -$1"/beginSimultaneousCommand/action Spiderbuttons.BETAS_Lightning 10 25/jump farmer 8/emote farmer 228/speak {{Aliyah}} "......$26"/setRaining Default true/setRaining Lemurkat_EastScarp true/setRaining Daine.TPOChoice true/endSimultaneouscommand/pause 250/playSound thunder/screenFlash 1/pause 250/speak {{Aliyah}} "Oh my stars....$27"/quickQuestion #DOC! Are you all right?!#Ah ahaha aha, ha, it's, it's your favorite song, huh....?(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.End1(break)switchEvent Daine.Aliyah.4H.End2
